gawusiya iwath kirimedi bhawitha wana sugama peli kriyawali thuna (gunana peli, huwamaru peli ha peli wala gunitha anek peli walata ekathu kirima) wamehi athi prathiwartha kala haki nyasa samaga mul nyasaya guna kirima sidu karayi.
epamanak nowa wanachara dashakaye aparadhakari ‘god fadar‘ gotabhayawa rate janadhipathi kirimata wali kanne da ewanima jadamadhyakarayan ya.
ehi pera thibuna hela bauddha sanskruthiye angath thibuna.
aya paminimata niyamithawa aththe megan kumariyage paminimata hariyatama miniththu pahakata peraya.
eeta passe muththa kanuwe hitiye muththa ispirithaleta ekkaragena giya.

mage ginuma nirikshanaya karanna	tendara	prakashana	danum kendraya	parisaraya	apage balashakthi jalaya	midiya galariya	apa gana	hadinwima - punarjananiya balashakthiya yanu kawareda ?wadi dura thorathuru sandaha jathika balashakthi prathipaththiya wathman thathwaya punarjananiya balashakthi aya-kramaya sammatha giwisum - balashakthi miladi ganima ma anugamanaya kala yuththe kumakda ?sewa konthraththu
af35 kiyanne nadaththu ha meheyum wiyadam adika ee wiyadama ada kaleta nogalapena yanayak.
samanya janathawa pamanak neweyi waidyawarun atharath me diyawadiyawa, kolestarol wani roga ihala gihin thiyenawa.
ara sulu sanskaranayak ekka dala thibune mage koment eka.
e se wuwa da barana ganithayata kisi dineka siya niwasa wetha paminimata no haki wi yayi wishwasayak pawathi.
meka ithama bhayanaka panathak, mehi aarambhayema me gana sandahan karala thiyenawa.
issara lankawata bas saha lori gennanakota, enjima hayi karapu chasiya witharayi gennanne.

ehema nathnam ithin lokka thun weni paratath path unoth, apita wenne, wel deka, eka welakata sima korala, ata deka kasa kasa, rawana ninden nagitala enakan, para ayinata wela ana gahagena, thatama thatama innatataya.

chanda wyaparaya thuladi ismathuwu pramukha wada wishayayan athara, nidahas skotlanthayak bhawitha karanuye kumana wyawahara mudalakda, rajya waya saha uthuru muhude thel wiya.[8] 1.1 skotlanthaya saha eksath rajadhaniya sthapanaya 1.2 balaya beda harima 2 bibisi nambauruwak pilibanda chodana 3 janamatha wimasim 4 prathipalaya 4.1 pradeshaya anuwa skotlanthaya saha eksath rajadhaniya sthapanaya[sanskaranaya] madhyathana yuga thuladi, skotlantha rajadhaniya saha engalantha rajadhaniya, swadhina ratawal lesin sansthapanaya kerini. 14wana siyawasehidi, yuddha malawak satankirimen pasuwa, 1603 wasarehidi, rajandu deka wisin pudgalika susangamayakata elembaa ( kiritayange susangamaya), skotlanthaye sayawana jems raja engalanthayehi palamuwana jems raja bawatada path wiya. 1653 wasarehidi, podu rajya mandalayaka parinayaka samiwaraya lesin oliwar kromwel prakashayata path kerunu wita, jathin deka ek rajayak yatathe thawakalikawa eksath wu namuth, 1660 wasarehidi, rajanduwa prathisansthapanaya kerunu wita wisuruwa harini. 1707di skotlanthaya saha engalanthaya eksath wuye maha brikanya rajadhaniya thanimataya. 1801di ayarlantha rajadhaniya ha samaga eksathwu maha brithanyaya, maha brithanya ha ayarlanthaya eksath rajadhaniya thaniya. 1922 wasarehidi, ayarlanthayen boho kotasak, ayarlantha nidahas rajyaya lesin susangamayen iwath wiya.

lenin ”rajaya ha wiplawaya”hi penwa dena paridi, maksge wiwechanayanhi nirawadyathawaya jarmanu espingi nayakathwaya wisin rupika lesa piliganna lada namudu ee bawa nothaka, 1886 di paksha nayaka oogast bebel “ape aramunu” mayen 1872 di nikuth kala, pahatha dakwena pataya athulath wana siya pusthikawa kisidu wenasakin thorawa yali pala kaleya: “thawada ee anuwa rajyaya, panthi palanaya matha padanam wuwaka sita janatha rajyayak bawata pariwarthanaya kere.”
